author: prbuzz.com
title: FEDERAL RESERVE: CONSUMER DEBT AT $3.4 TRILLION AND RISING
text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
Contact: Bob Harry
Tel: (561) 412-1856
Email: This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
Statistic Alarming — But Debt Consolidation Helps Individuals to Reduce It
West Palm Beach, Fl., United States of America – September 23, 2015 – Consumer confidence is on the rise as auto and student loans have boomed by billions over Spring and Summer 2015.
The debt, which stands now at $3.4 trillion, translates into a cool $10,200 for every man, woman and child in America. While individual financial situations vary, some consumers may find that their debt has become unmanageable.
While many consumers are able to keep their debt manageable and pay their bills on time, some run into financial problems — whether from unexpected bills or loss of employment, they find themselves with an urgent need for help.
Debt Consolidation has helped hundreds of thousands of individuals to refinance their debt into one manageable payment. To find out more, visit http://www.reducemydebtfla.com .
About Debt Consolidation
Debt Consolidation is a new website that has been designed to help consumers experiencing financial issues to consolidate their outstanding debts into one manageable debt for easier loan elimination, leading back to a healthier financial future. For more information, please visit Debt Consolidation’s website .
Website: http://reducemydebtfla.com
